sen.j: 朽木 宣綱（くつき のぶつな、天正10年（1582年） - 寛文2年5月1日 (旧暦)（1662年6月16日））は、安土桃山時代から江戸時代前期にかけての武将。
sen.e: Nobutsuna KUTSUKI (1582 - June 16, 1662) was busho (Japanese military commander) from Azuchi-Momoyama Period to the early Edo Period.

sen.e: His children were Tomotsuna KUTSUKI, Yoshitsuna KUTSUKI, Mototsuna KUTSUKI (same name as his father), Yoshitada OSHIMA's wife, Kaikyu OKAMOTO's wife, Soji KAWAGUCHI'S wife, and Dokaku KORAI's wife.

sen.e: He served as one of hatamoto (direct retainers) with 6470 koku (approximately 1.16 million liters of crop yield) under Edo bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun).
